Module es.upm.fi.cig.multictbnc
Package es.upm.fi.cig.multictbnc.nodes

Interface Node

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractNode, CIMNode, CPTNode, DiscreteNode
public interface Node
Interface for a generic node of a PGM.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean areParametersEstimated()
    Returns true if the parameters of the node were estimated.
    void clearParentAndChildrenSets()
    Remove the set of parents and children of the node.
    double estimateLogLikelihood()
    Returns the local log-likelihood for the node.
    java.util.List<Node> getChildren()
    Returns the children of the node.
    java.lang.String getName()
    Returns the name of the node.
    int getNumParents()
    Returns the number of parents of the node.
    Node getParent​(java.lang.String name)
    Returns the parent of the node whose name is given.
    java.util.List<Node> getParents()
    Returns the parents of the node.
    boolean hasParents()
    Specifies if the node has parents.
    boolean isClassVariable()
    Specifies if the node is a class variable.
    void isClassVariable​(boolean isClassVariable)
    Defines if the node is a class variable.
    void removeAllEdges()
    Removes the parents and children of the node.
    void removeChild​(Node childNode)
    Removes a certain child of the node.
    void removeChildren()
    Removes the children of the node.
    void removeParent​(Node parentNode)
    Removes a certain parent of the node.
    void removeParents()
    Removes the parents of the node.
    void setChild​(Node childNode)
    Defines a provided node as a child of this one.
    void setParent​(Node parentNode)
    Defines a provided node as a parent of this one.
    void setSufficientStatistics​(SufficientStatistics ss)
    Establishes the sufficient statistics of the node.

  • Method Details

    • areParametersEstimated

      boolean areParametersEstimated()
      Returns true if the parameters of the node were estimated.
      Returns:
      true if the parameters of the node were estimated, false otherwise

    • clearParentAndChildrenSets

      void clearParentAndChildrenSets()
      Remove the set of parents and children of the node. This method should be used with caution, as references to this node from others will not be affected. It is recommended its use when creating an empty PGM, i.e., we are removing all edges between nodes.

    • estimateLogLikelihood

      double estimateLogLikelihood()
      Returns the local log-likelihood for the node.
      Returns:
      local log-likelihood

    • getChildren

      java.util.List<Node> getChildren()
      Returns the children of the node.
      Returns:
      child node list

    • getName

      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the node.
      Returns:
      node name

    • getNumParents

      int getNumParents()
      Returns the number of parents of the node.
      Returns:
      parent node list

    • getParent

      Node getParent​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the parent of the node whose name is given.
      Parameters:
      name - parent node name
      Returns:
      the parent node or null if the parent was not found

    • getParents

      java.util.List<Node> getParents()
      Returns the parents of the node.
      Returns:
      parent node list

    • hasParents

      boolean hasParents()
      Specifies if the node has parents.
      Returns:
      true if the node has parents, false otherwise

    • isClassVariable

      void isClassVariable​(boolean isClassVariable)
      Defines if the node is a class variable.
      Parameters:
      isClassVariable - true if the node is a class variable, false otherwise

    • isClassVariable

      boolean isClassVariable()
      Specifies if the node is a class variable.
      Returns:
      true if the node is a class variable, false otherwise

    • removeAllEdges

      void removeAllEdges()
      Removes the parents and children of the node.

    • removeChild

      void removeChild​(Node childNode)
      Removes a certain child of the node.
      Parameters:
      childNode - child node

    • removeChildren

      void removeChildren()
      Removes the children of the node.

    • removeParent

      void removeParent​(Node parentNode)
      Removes a certain parent of the node.
      Parameters:
      parentNode - parent node

    • removeParents

      void removeParents()
      Removes the parents of the node.

    • setChild

      void setChild​(Node childNode)
      Defines a provided node as a child of this one.
      Parameters:
      childNode - child node

    • setParent

      void setParent​(Node parentNode)
      Defines a provided node as a parent of this one.
      Parameters:
      parentNode - parent node

    • setSufficientStatistics

      void setSufficientStatistics​(SufficientStatistics ss)
      Establishes the sufficient statistics of the node.
      Parameters:
      ss - sufficient statistics
